TopicTitle: StarSpark SSTO Rocketplane - 100% stock + Bonus Aircraft

Articles.Content:
It\'s been a long time since I released one of my designs, and like everyone else I got stuck into aircraft, and my first plane turned out to be my best. **Updated for 0.15.1**

The StarSpark SSTO Rocketplane is a modification of my first ever 0.15 aircraft design, the Spark Airfighter which can be seen [here.](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12535.msg194992#msg194992)

The Rocketplane itself was built for an SSTO fully reusable spaceplane challenge started by [boolybooly.](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12837.0)

This aircraft took me four iterations to get the balance right, as with the engine any further rearwards it\'ll tumble and tear itself apart, but as it is now, it is a very stable, agile and capable little plane, so much so that it does not have or need an ASAS, regular SAS or the new SAS nosecone.

I\'m sure smaller SSTO craft are possible but this one is *flyable* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

A full Imgur gallery of my recent flight is [here.](https://imgur.com/a/exXmq#0)

And here is the StarSpark in the metal.

![abo39.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/abo39.jpg)

I hope you have fun with this craft, I think you\'ll like it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
